text: Approval for the modification to the model 3721 eon mini chargingsystem.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name model 3720 eon mini le charger and model 3722 eon mini le charging system and is indicated as an aid in the management of chronic pain of the trunk and/or limbs, including unilateral pain associated with any of the following: failed back surgery syndrome, and chronic low back/leg pain.
